name: esp-link
description: esp8266 wifi-serial bridge, outbound TCP, and arduino/AVR/LPC/NXP programmer
full_description:
This image serves to build the esp-link firmware for the esp8266. It does not contain esp-link itself! The key to using this image is to mount the esp-link source code directory onto /esp-link in the container. See https://github.com/jeelabs/esp-link and in particular https://github.com/jeelabs/esp-link/blob/master/BUILDING.md

Note that there are multiple versions of this docker image with different versions of the Espressif SDK. Use the docker image tag matching the Espressif SDK version you need.
